::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus' evasibe manuvering allows him to avoid the first barage of auto-gun fire. Jhiaxus flies directly into the Maximal base's shield grid, drawing all of it's power to that position. Jhiaxus then fires two rockets from below his wings that should be able to slip past the shields. The rockets are headed for the shield generator.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  autoguns:
 
 The autoguns opened fired towards Jhiaxus while all base locked down 
 insolating all vital areas
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > Not far from the old Maximal base, Jhiaxus is standing against a 
 tree, thinking about how to kill his prey.
 > 
 > "I must kill that damn Autobot fool, Kup. He knows too much. I 
 don't want ol' Hot Rod knowing I'm coming for him. It would be very 
 easy if I could get to them right now. Just a nearly deactivated Kup 
 and some local Maximal. I could crush them both easily. Maximal 
 reinforcements are probably on the way though. I need to get through 
 that bases automated defense. Ah hah! Most Maximal vessels have their 
 shield generator located on their dorsal side. My body frame is 
 stronger then what these outdated Cybertronians know of. If I flew 
 directly into their shield grid all the power would be concentrated 
 there. I could withstand that for a moment or two. With all the power 
 concentrating on that location, my rockets could slip past the 
 shields and hit the generator as well as allowing me an entrence. The 
 auto-guns would be a problem but I can out manuver those things. I 
 must work quickly."
 > 
 > Jhiaxus transforms back to jet mode and heads for the Maximal base.
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>

::Lord Jhiaxus::<br><br>Jhiaxus' evasibe manuvering allows him to avoid the first barage of auto-gun fire. Jhiaxus flies directly into the Maximal base's shield grid, drawing all of it's power to that position. Jhiaxus then fires two rockets from below his wings that should be able to slip past the shields. The rockets are headed for the shield generator.<br><br><b><i>xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...></i></b> wrote:<blockquote class="replbq" style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;">     <!-- Network content -->           <div id="ygrp-text">             <div>autoguns:<br> <br> The autoguns opened fired towards Jhiaxus while all base locked down <br> insolating all vital areas<br> <br> --- In <a

He knows too much. I <br> don't want ol' Hot Rod knowing I'm coming for him. It would be very <br> easy if I could get to them right now. Just a nearly deactivated Kup <br> and some local Maximal. I could crush them both easily. Maximal <br> reinforcements are probably on the way though. I need to get through <br> that bases automated defense. Ah hah! Most Maximal vessels have their <br> shield generator located on their dorsal side. My body frame is <br> stronger then what these outdated Cybertronians know of. If I flew <br> directly into their shield grid all the power would be concentrated <br> there. I could withstand that
 for a moment or two. With all the power <br> concentrating on that location, my rockets could slip past the <br> shields and hit the generator as well as allowing me an entrence. The <br> auto-guns would be a problem but I can out manuver those things.
